info.name: Digital Forensics Fundamentals
info.main: Test your knowledge of the phases, methodologies, and best practices in digital forensic analysis.
info.results: Congratulations! You've demonstrated a strong understanding of key concepts in digital forensics.

questions.q: What is the primary purpose of digital forensics?

a.option: To detect vulnerabilities in real time
To identify, preserve, and analyze digital evidence after a security incident

questions.q: Which tool is appropriate for acquiring a forensic disk image?
Why is calculating cryptographic hashes important during evidence acquisition?

a.option: To encrypt the data before analysis
To verify the integrity and authenticity of the evidence

questions.q: Which tool is recommended for memory analysis?
What is a good practice during the analysis phase?

a.option: Correlating multiple sources such as logs and network traffic
Sharing credentials of the analysis team

questions.q: What is the main objective of the presentation phase?

a.option: To delete all evidence after analysis
To communicate forensic findings in a clear and verifiable manner

questions.q: In the provided case study, how was the incident initially detected?

a.option: An unusual process was found in RAM
Files appeared encrypted with a .locked extension
An open port was found on the firewall
A 404 error occurred on the web server
